tool_description: Check an applicant's right to work by providing a share code and some basic details. Note that although this does check the official source, it is not the government's official tool.
name: UK Right to Work Sharecode Checker
title: UK Right to Work Sharecode Checker
tool_name: UK Right to Work Sharecode Checker

api_list.name: Get RTW From Share code
api_list.description: Use Share code and applicant details to get RTW information
